config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalAgeThreshold configuration is used in the journal method to set the age threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration depends on the usage of the journal method in the code. If the journal method is called frequently, then the _journalAgeThreshold configuration will be triggered accordingly.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration on the system is related to the size of the journal. Setting a higher age threshold may result in larger journal files and potentially slower performance due to increased disk usage. Conversely, setting a lower age threshold may result in more frequent journal file rotations and potentially faster performance but with more disk I/O operations.
